quote: He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High Shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
author: Psalm 91:1

quote: I will say of the Lord, 'He is my refuge and my fortress; My God, in Him I will trust.'
author: Psalm 91:2

quote: Surely He shall deliver you from the snare of the fowler And from the perilous pestilence.
author: Psalm 91:3

quote: He shall cover you with His feathers, And under His wings you shall take refuge; His truth shall be your shield and buckler.
author: Psalm 91:4

quote: You shall not be afraid of the terror by night, Nor of the arrow that flies by day,
author: Psalm 91:5

quote: Nor of the pestilence that walks in darkness, Nor of the destruction that lays waste at noonday.
author: Psalm 91:6

quote: A thousand may fall at your side, And ten thousand at your right hand; But it shall not come near you.
author: Psalm 91:7

quote: Only with your eyes shall you look, And see the reward of the wicked.
author: Psalm 91:8

quote: Because you have made the Lord, who is my refuge, Even the Most High, your dwelling place,
author: Psalm 91:9

quote: No evil shall befall you, Nor shall any plague come near your dwelling;
author: Psalm 91:10

quote: For He shall give His angels charge over you, To keep you in all your ways.
author: Psalm 91:11

quote: In their hands they shall bear you up, Lest you dash your foot against a stone.
author: Psalm 91:12

quote: You shall tread upon the lion and the cobra, The young lion and the serpent you shall trample underfoot.
author: Psalm 91:13

quote: “Because he has set his love upon Me, therefore I will deliver him; I will set him on high, because he has known My name.
author: Psalm 91:14

quote: He shall call upon Me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him and honor him.
author: Psalm 91:15

quote: With long life I will satisfy him, And show him My salvation.”
author: Psalm 91:16
